mapper.sql: user_id AS userId, role_id AS roleId, username, password, salt, locked, del_flg AS delFlg
mapper.select: SELECT ap.id as id, ap.`name` as name, ap.parent_id as parentId, ap.sort as sort, ap.url as url FROM admin_user a LEFT JOIN admin_role ar ON ar.role_id = a.role_id LEFT JOIN role_permission rp ON rp.role_id = ar.role_id LEFT JOIN admin_permission ap ON rp.permission_id = ap.id WHERE a.username = #{username} ORDER BY ap.sort
SELECT T2.ROLE_NAME AS roleName, T2.ROLE_ID AS roleId FROM ADMIN_USER T1 LEFT JOIN ADMIN_ROLE T2 ON T2.ROLE_ID = T1.ROLE_ID WHERE T1.USERNAME=#{username}
